description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Athletic Club vs Leganés in the Spanish La Liga
title: Athletic Club vs Leganés: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head
title_page: Athletic Club vs Leganés: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt saved. Nico Serrano (Athletic Club) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Oihan Sancet.
Post
Attempt missed. Gorka Guruzeta (Athletic Club) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Yuri Berchiche with a cross.
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt blocked. Óscar De Marcos (Athletic Club) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Post
Attempt saved. Julián Chicco (Leganes) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Munir El Haddadi with a through ball.
Post
Munir El Haddadi (Leganes) hits the bar with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Óscar Rodríguez following a fast break.
